name: Projet Shadow
description:
After a short life in the hospital, the cancer finally took your life. But to finally claim inner peace, you must reach out the pathway trough your fear. Don't let the shadow absorb you, or your soul will be forever corrupted. Good luck kid !

Game developped with a team of two in 2-3 month for our semestrial project, with the instruction to create a 2.5D puzzle/stress game Inside like.
